articles.description: Following the events of Industry season-two finale episode, “Jerusalem,”  Ken Leung discusses Eric’s inner life, the value of his purple sweatshirt vs. his baseball bat, and filming Netflix’s upcoming ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’ live-action series.
articles.content:
Spoilers follow for Jerusalem, the season-two finale of Industry.
After spending most of Industrys second season being screwed over by his protégés, CPSs one-time trade daddy Eric used the season-tw… [+10962 chars]
